entities.description: Nine attributes of Major Depressive Episode (MDE), including sadness, discouragement, or lack of interest in most things.
Diagnosis criteria for determining if an individual had a Major Depressive Episode in their lifetime.
One of the nine attributes of MDE; feeling sad.
One of the nine attributes of MDE; feeling discouraged.
One of the nine attributes of MDE; lack of interest in most things.
Feeling of emotional distress associated with MDE.
Emotional distress so severe that the respondent could not be cheered up.
Emotional distress that is more than mild but not severe.
Variable code for reporting feeling sad, empty, or depressed.
Variable code for reporting feeling discouraged about things.
Variable code for reporting lack of interest in most things.

relationships.description: Defines the set criteria for diagnosing MDE.
Sadness is one of the nine attributes of MDE.
Discouragement is one of the nine attributes of MDE.
Lack of interest in most things is one of the nine attributes of MDE.
Emotional distress can vary in severity.
YDS21 is the variable code for reporting feelings of sadness.
YDS22 is the variable code for reporting feelings of discouragement.
YDS23 is the variable code for reporting lack of interest in most things.
